summary.para: Defines a validation rule demanding that an object should be referenced in objects of a specified type.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Persistent.Validation.RuleIsReferencedAttribute.#ctor(System.String,DevExpress.Persistent.Validation.DefaultContexts,System.Type,System.String,System.String)

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the RuleIsReferencedAttribute class.

member.param: A string value representing the current rule identifier. You can pass an empty value as the id parameter. An appropriate identifier will be generated automatically, and set for the ID attribute of the Validation | Rules | Rule node in the Application Model.
A DefaultContexts enumeration value that specifes a context for checking the current rule. This value is set for the property.
A type of the objects to be tested.
A string value representing the name of the property that can be set to the target object. This property must belong to the class specified by the looksFor parameter.
A string value representing information defining the current rule. This value is set for the property.

A type of the objects to be searched for.
A string value representing the name of the property that can be set to the target object. This property must belong to the class specified by the looksFor parameter.
A string value representing information defining the current rule. This value is set for the property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.Validation.RuleIsReferencedAttribute.CriteriaEvaluationBehavior

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.Validation.RuleIsReferencedAttribute.FoundObjectMessageFormat

summary.para: Gets or sets the format for specifying information on the found objects that reference the target object in the validation error message.

summary.para: Defines a validation rule that demands a true value for the target non-persistent Boolean property.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Persistent.Validation.RuleFromBoolPropertyAttribute.#ctor(System.String,DevExpress.Persistent.Validation.DefaultContexts,System.String)

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the RuleFromBoolPropertyAttribute class.

member.param: A string value representing the current rule identifier. You can pass an empty value as the id parameter. An appropriate identifier will be generated automatically, and set for the ID attribute of the Validation | Rules | Rule node in the Application Model.
A DefaultContexts enumeration value that specifes a context for checking the current rule. This value is set for the property.
A string value representing information defining the current rule. This value is set for the property.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.Validation.RuleFromBoolPropertyAttribute.UsedProperties

summary.para: Specifies the names of the properties to be highlighted when the rule generated from the current attribute is broken.

member.value: A string value that lists the names of the properties that must be highlighted as invalid when the rule is broken. The names must be separated by a comma.

summary.para: Represents a base class for validation system attributes.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.Validation.RuleBaseAttribute.ContextIDs

summary.para: Specifies a context for checking the current Rule.

member.value: A ContextIdentifiers object representing a list of identifiers of the contexts, when the current rule should be checked.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.Validation.RuleBaseAttribute.Description

summary.para: Returns information text to be added to the exception message when the current rule is broken.

member.value: A string value representing information defining the current rule.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.Validation.RuleBaseAttribute.InvertResult

summary.para: Specifies whether the current rule should be inverted, to be checked.

member.value: trueif an inverted rule will be checked; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.Validation.RuleBaseAttribute.SkipNullOrEmptyValues

summary.para: Specifies whether the current rule is checked for the properties that are set to null (Nothing in VB), an empty string (for string type propeties) or a minimal date (for DateTime type properties).

member.value: true if null-like values are not checked by the current rule; otherwise, false.

summary.para: Initializes a new instance of the RuleBaseAttribute class.

member.name: M:DevExpress.Persistent.Validation.RuleBaseAttribute.SetTargetClass(System.Type)

summary.para: For internal use only.

member.param: A class to be validated.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.Validation.RuleBaseAttribute.Name

summary.para: Specifies a name of the rule created using the current attribute.

member.value: A string representing a name of the rule to be created.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.Validation.RuleBaseAttribute.TargetCriteria

summary.para: Specifies a criteria that must be satisfied by the validated object or property to check rules.

member.value: A string that represents a criteria that must be satisfied to check validation rules.

member.name: P:DevExpress.Persistent.Validation.RuleBaseAttribute.CustomMessageTemplate

summary.para: Specifies informational text to be added to the exception message, when the current rule is broken.

member.value: A string value representing information defining the current rule.
